unnormalised: Hey everyone, great discussion! Training is key, right? Remember Mary Kom's insane regimen? 20 km runs before breakfast! My cousin, Dr. Sharma at AIIMS, swears by HIIT. I've converted my spare room (100 sq ft!) into a mini gym. Costs me around Rs. 5000/month. Worth it though! Any tips on incorporating yoga (Surya Namaskar especially) into a weightlifting routine? My performance at the local kabbadi tournament last year wasn't great, R.I.P. my medal hopes!
